label: 素袍
本: Edo Culture: Daily Life and Diversions in Urban Japan, 1600-1868 . University of Hawai'i Press . 1997
説明文: Man's costume with wide-sleeved top garment and long skirtlike trousers. During the Muromachi period (1333-1573) it was often worn by commoners, but from the Edo period it became ceremonial costume for warriors.［室町］
